responses: The Wangsa Maju bus route starts at BUS STOP 6 TARUMT and passes through TARVILLA, LRT Wangsa Maju, Hospital ATM Tunku Mizan, and BUS STOP METROVIEW before looping back through GATE 7 TARUMT, East Campus, BUS STOP 1/2/3 TARUMT, and returning to BUS STOP 6 TARUMT.

The Wangsa Maju bus route begins at BUS STOP 6 TARUMT, then continues through TARVILLA, LRT Wangsa Maju, Hospital ATM Tunku Mizan, and BUS STOP METROVIEW, before looping back via GATE 7 TARUMT, East Campus, BUS STOP 1/2/3 TARUMT, and finally returning to BUS STOP 6 TARUMT.

responses: The bus schedules for all routes feature arrivals every 30 minutes before 6 PM, with service continuing every hour after 6 PM. The Wangsa Maju route, Melati Utama/PV route, PV18/TERATAI RESIDENCY/GK route, and PV10/12/13/15/16 route all follow this timing pattern. Buses on these routes arrive at their respective starting points (BUS STOP 6 TARUMT, BUS STOP 3 TARUMT, BUS STOP 4 TARUMT, and BUS STOP 1 TARUMT) every 30 minutes from 07:30 until 17:30, and then every hour from 18:00 until 21:00.

All bus routes operate with arrivals every 30 minutes before 6 PM and shift to hourly service after 6 PM. This pattern applies to the Wangsa Maju, Melati Utama/PV, PV18/TERATAI RESIDENCY/GK, and PV10/12/13/15/16 routes. Buses on these routes arrive at their starting points (BUS STOP 6 TARUMT, BUS STOP 3 TARUMT, BUS STOP 4 TARUMT, and BUS STOP 1 TARUMT) every 30 minutes from 07:30 to 17:30, and then every hour from 18:00 to 21:00.

Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student card
Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student ID
TARUMT student card
TARUMT student ID
I am a Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student, do I need to show my student card to take the shuttle bus?
I am a Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student, do I need to show my student ID to take the shuttle bus?
I am a TARUMT student, do I need to show my student card to take the shuttle bus?
I am a TARUMT student, do I need to show my student ID to take the shuttle bus?
Anything to bring for taking the TARUMT shuttle bus?
responses: The shuttle bus service is free for TARUMT students. You need either a TARUMT student card or an offer letter for those who have not yet obtained a TARUMT student card.

Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology provides a complimentary shuttle bus service for its students. To access this service, individuals are required to present a valid Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student identification card. In the case of new students who have not yet received their student ID card, a copy of the offer letter will suffice.

Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology offers a free shuttle bus service for the students. To use this service, one must show a valid Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology student ID card. However, new students awaiting their student ID card can use their offer letter as a temporary proof of identification to access the shuttle service.

Any rules or guidelines or regulations?
responses: Guidelines for using the shuttle bus service include presenting your TARUMT student identification card upon boarding, forming an orderly line while getting on and off the bus, and refraining from eating or drinking on the bus.

To utilize Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology's shuttle bus service, it is mandatory for passengers to present their TARUMT student identification card upon entering the bus. This service is exclusively available to the university's students. Additionally, it is required to form an orderly line while getting on and off the bus to ensure a smooth and efficient transportation experience for all.
